creator: manuel_carrasco@users.sourceforge.net
text:
https://domain.com/APP/action.do;jsessionid=49B62101DEF2ED7017150B0179ED059F;random=1234?param=1

Tomcat uses the ';' character to separate parameters that come with the url path.
So in this example tomcat extracts correctly the session with the value: 49B62101DEF2ED7017150B0179ED059F. But mod_proxy_balancer gets 49B62101DEF2ED7017150B0179ED059F;random=1234 because it doesn't use the ";" as a separator.

I attach a patch that solves the problem.

Thanks.
Manuel Carrasco

Created attachment 22095
patch to fix the problem
creator: manuel_carrasco@users.sourceforge.net

text: Thanks for the patch. Applied to trunk r686809
creator: jim@apache.org
